Content: Excise officers were able to raid a tourist hotel in Pannala and seized a large stock of liquor. The raid was conducted based on a tip-off received by the officers of the Excise Departmentâ€™s Special Investigation Unit and made the arrest due to absence of a proper license to sell liquor. 117 bottles of foreign liquor and 63 beer bottlers were among the seized stock. According to the Excise Department sources an individual has been arrested in connection with the incident. Further investigations are being done on the instructions of superintendent of the Excise Department Channa Weerakkody.
